fields.name: Intake_Text
fields.fieldText:
Who do we contact to begin the intake process?

(direct contact with the Young Person is always preferred where possible)

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 200 characters.
Cannot contain more than 200 characters.
Phone numbers must be 10-13 digits long and only numerical values are accepted. The plus symbol at the beginning is also valid.

fields.name: What_is_the_best_time_to_contact_this_person
fields.fieldText: What is the best time to contact this person?

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 255 characters.

fields.name: Complete_Text
fields.fieldText:
Your referral has been submitted. 


A member of our team will be in touch with the referred young person soon to follow up and discuss the next steps. 


Please note that headspace is not an emergency service. For mental health emergencies, please contact your local health service or call 000. The duty of care remains with the referrer, who must ensure appropriate steps are taken to support the client throughout the referral process.


headspace is available from 9am to 1am AEST via webchat and phone. https://headspace.org.au/online-and-phone-support/connect-with-us/phone/ Emails can be sent to eheadspace at any time.


You can now close this window or press Finish to be returned to the headspace page.

fields.name: Email_Text
fields.fieldText: Do you want to receive an pdf copy of the referral via email?

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 200 characters.
Phone numbers must be 10-13 digits long and only numerical values are accepted. The plus symbol at the beginning is also valid.
Please enter a valid email address or leave this field blank if no email can be provided.

fields.name: Missing_Information_Text
fields.fieldText:
Missing Information:


The address must contain the following:

  • City
  • State
  • Postcode

Please return to the previous page and enter the required address information.

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 50 characters.
Cannot contain more than 200 characters.
Cannot contain more than 200 characters.
Phone numbers must be 10-13 digits long and only numerical values are accepted. The plus symbol at the beginning is also valid.
Please enter a valid email address or leave this field blank if no email can be provided.

fields.name: Safety_Text
fields.fieldText:
Safety Concerns/Risks:

Please tell us the challenges the Young Person is experiencing that they would like help with.


Please tick all that apply.

Note - If the Young People is needing support with something that is not listed, please let us know. This is not a comprehensive list of the supports we provide.

fields.name: Support_Information
fields.fieldText: Can you provide some more information about some support the Young Person might be seeking?

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 65536 characters.

fields.name: Are_there_any_safety_or_risk_concerns_for_the_Young_Person
fields.fieldText: Are there any safety or risk concerns for the Young Person?

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 32768 characters.

fields.name: Is_there_a_safety_plan_in_place
fields.fieldText: Is there a safety plan in place?

fields.name: Other_services_or_agencies_you_know_are_involved_in_the_Young_Person_s_care
fields.fieldText: Other services or agencies you know are involved in the Young Person’s care:

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 65536 characters.

fields.name: Welcome_Text
fields.fieldText:
School/Service Provider Referral Form


  • headspace accepts referrals for young people aged between 12 and 25 years.
  • Referrals will NOT be processed without consent from the Young Person.
  • We accept referrals for young people who live in Tweed Heads, Ballina, Lismore and surrounding areas.
  • Once we have received your referral, we may be in touch regarding any other information we require to process the referral.
  • Please note that headspace is not a crisis service or acute care mental health service. For mental health emergencies contact the Mental Health Line on 1800 011 511. Alternatively, direct your Young Person to present to their nearest emergency department.

fields.name: Young_Consent_Text
fields.fieldText:
Consent from Young Person:

﻿Have you discussed this referral with the Young Person and have they provided consent that they would like to engage with headspace, are willing to have their details stored in our system, and are willing to be contacted?

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 200 characters.

fields.name: How_did_the_Young_Person_Consent
fields.fieldText: How did the Young Person Consent?

validationRule.errorMessage: Consent Date cannot be in the future.

fields.name: Parent_Consent_Text
fields.fieldText:
Parent/Guardian Consent 

If the Young Person is under the age of 16, consent from their legal guardian is required.

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 200 characters.
Consent Date cannot be in the future.

fields.fieldText: Has the Young Person given consent to contact the Parent/Guardian?

validationRule.errorMessage: Consent Date cannot be in the future.

textTemplates.name: EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!Referrer_Name}, 

  

Your referral has been submitted. 


A member of our team will be in touch with the referred young person soon to follow up and discuss the next steps. 


Please note that headspace is not an emergency service. For mental health emergencies, please contact your local health service or call 000. The duty of care remains with the referrer, who must ensure appropriate steps are taken to support the client throughout the referral process.


headspace is available from 9am to 1am AEST via webchat and phone. https://headspace.org.au/online-and-phone-support/connect-with-us/phone/ Emails can be sent to eheadspace at any time.


Best Regards, 

Social Futures.

textTemplates.name: headspaceBody
textTemplates.text:
{!headspace_Location},


A referral has been submitted. Please see attachment.
